chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 12 mini has the above problem: The order should have arrived by today, but it's still not shipped. What's holding it up? Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

According to the tracking, I see that you have not yet delivered the package to the carrier.

Please ship the device today and provide a valid tracking number.

Thomas Hand
Newtonstraße 7A
12489 Berlin
Deutschland
+493024333477
mail@hand-thomas.de

Regards,
Ercan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have informed our logistics partner to ship out the device. The tracking number should be sent out by the end of the day. Please do not refund the customer as the order has already been dispatched.

Regards,
RK

Dear Backcare,

We have shipped out the device to the customer.

Here is the tracking number: 1ZBF1560D901094250

Please note that as the courier has just picked up the parcel, it might take a while before it is accurately displayed on their website.

In the meantime please do not refund.

If you initiate a refund while the product is being shipped, we will lodge a case with SSC.

Regards,
HB

Dear ecomobile

Customer would like the refund.
Customer says the following: I ordered another device.
As soon as you have received the device, I ask you to initiate the refund within 2 working days.

Regards,
Ercan from the Back Care Team
